xmlkeyword.term: Overview of the EiffelEnvision Class View

paragraph.paragraph:
The vxurfClassViewWindow 0 Class View window, like the vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog 0 Solution Explorer window, contains projects, at the top-level. The number of EiffelEnvision projects in the vxurfClassViewWindow 0 Class View is directly representative of the number of the same projects contained in the vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog 0 Solution Explorer . Expanding a node that represents an EiffelEnvision project, represented by the ../images/project.ico icon, will display a tree of url*clusters.
Note: Expanding an EiffelEnvision project that has not been compiled, or has not compiled information available, will display a the message "System needs to be fully compiled for browsing." EiffelEnvision projects require a project be url*Built before browsing the information contained within the vxurfClassViewWindow 0 Class View .

Once a project node has been expanded, it will display a tree of index.xmlCluster Nodes. Within cluster nodes, subcluster nodes and classes.xmlClass Nodes will be presented in a list merging the two. Expanding a subcluster will show more subclusters and classes.xmlClass Nodes for the given cluster context. If a class has been compiled in a project, denoted by a blue icon, that classes.xmlClass Nodes can then in turn be expanded to reveal its features.xmlFeature Nodes.
Note: classes.xmlClass Nodes and features.xmlFeature Nodes also show statuary information regarding their respective status and usage from within the project. Please refer to the respective documentation on each for more information.
